Central Air Conditioning, washer/dryer in unit, basement storage area, and sitting and grilling area in the back. Close proximity to Beach and Castle Island, Boston's Seaport Area and more. Come make this house your home. OPEN HOUSE ON SUN 8/13 @ 1 - 3 PM
